VINDICATION CRITICAL Version 1.0

The Vindication Evidence

Independent Specialist Confirmations That Refute Psychiatric Framing

Date: 2026-01-17
Status: CURRENT
Source: FOUNDATIONAL_ESSAY_VINDICATION_EVIDENCE_2026-01-17.docx

Executive Summary

Compiles the independent specialist statements that vindicate John Thomson's physical symptoms and refute the psychiatric/functional framing. Dr Karunaratne: 'medical explanations have been found.' Dr Gorrie removed somatoform noting 'clear causes for his pain.' Pain Clinic stated somatoform was 'NOT their opinion.' Multiple imaging studies confirm TOS over 6 years.

Key Arguments

1

Dr Gorrie independently removed somatoform diagnosis

2

Pain Clinic explicitly disagreed with somatoform characterisation

3

Dr Karunaratne: 'medical explanations have been found for symptoms'

4

Formal epilepsy diagnosis (not NEAD/functional seizures)

5

POTS diagnosis refuted by cardiologist - 'test did not show this'

6

TOS confirmed on imaging over 6-year timeline (2019, 2024, 2025)

7

Psychiatric assessment found NO mental health disorders

Supporting Evidence

F030 VINDICATION

Dr Gorrie Removes Somatoform Diagnosis

Dr Alexander Gorrie marked the Somatoform Pain Disorder diagnosis as INACTIVE on 22 July 2025, noting 'there were clear causes for his pain.' Highly unusual to remove without formal psychiatric reassessment - error was self-evident.
F031 VINDICATION

Pain Clinic Refutes Somatoform

Pain Clinic explicitly disagreed with somatoform characterisation. GP record states: 'GP prev told somatic, pain clinic at C&W; felt not somatic.'
F128 VINDICATION

Karunaratne: 'Medical Explanations Found'

Dr Karunaratne explicitly stated: 'Rib and thoracic fractures have been confirmed' and 'medical explanations have been found for symptoms that he has been experiencing for a long time.'
F337 VINDICATION

'Medical Explanations Found' - Vindication Statement

Dr Karunaratne: 'Today was the first time he sounded somewhat positive in a very long time. This is largely due to the fact that medical explanations have been found for symptoms that he has been experiencing for a long time.'
F354 VINDICATION

Formal Epilepsy Diagnosis

Dr Karunaratne formally diagnosed: 'Epilepsy with generalised seizures.' Not functional/dissociative seizures.
F356 VINDICATION

Vascular Surgeon Lists Formal Diagnoses - Organic Conditions Confirmed

Vascular surgeon Mr Aaron Goh's formal diagnosis list includes: Epilepsy (NOT NEAD/FND), T5-T8 fractured vertebrae and ribs (confirmed), EDS/Hypermobility, Tremor of UNKNOWN AETIOLOGY (NOT labelled functional).
F357 VINDICATION

MRA Confirms Subclavian Compression and Stenosis

MRA imaging confirms 'compression of the subclavian vein on the left as well as a focal stenosis of the left subclavian artery' in the subclavicular space.
